list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a soft cheese similar to Brie
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một pho mát mềm tương tự như brie

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or thing similar to another.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was one of those whose similar you never meet
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy là một trong những người có vẻ giống như bạn không bao giờ gặp nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance that produces effects resembling the symptoms of particular diseases (the basis of homeopathic treatment).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the principle of treatment by similars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nguyên tắc điều trị theo tương tự
